author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: Thermaltake TR100 mini-ITX Travel Case on Amazon https://geni.us/Yn9DXb
Montech is preparing to launch new air coolers to battle Thermalright and, by their own wording, take DeepCool's former spot in the US market. Montech isn't quite at Thermalright levels of cheap, but they're trying to get there -- and so is everyone else. Montech also has a number of new cases coming out over the next 6-8 months, including the Sky 3, King 45, King 15, X5 budget case, X5M, the "ten," and more. We'll cover those as quickly as we can in this round-up of the case and cooling company's suite at #computex2025.

HAVN has a really interesting new case and some ultra thick fans with a lot of engineering in them. Check out our news coverage of those here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eeGwSlLXXw8

The best way to support our work is through our store: https://store.gamersnexus.net/

Like our content? Please consider becoming our Patron to support us: http://www.patreon.com/gamersnexus

TIMESTAMPS
title: Montech is Targeting Thermalright: Cheap Air Coolers, Sky 3 Case, Micro-ATX, X5, & More

author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: Thermalright Frozen Prism 360 on Amazon - https://geni.us/FUqbQC
HAVN made the well-built but strange HS420 PC case from last year, and now the company is back with a heavy emphasis on thermal performance and acoustics -- though we'll have to test it in our own benchmarking and reviews. The new HAVN BF360 joins the HS420, with the BF360 also bringing in new fans in the 180mm, 140mm, and 120mm categories. The HAVN 180mm fan uses a 40mm thick frame (after experimenting with 52mm thick previously), and special shaping on the hub for what HAVN claims will improve pressure performance across the hub. We won't have benchmarks and thermal performance until they launch, but for now, we can go through what HAVN's thermal engineer is targeting in design.

Find our HAVN HS420 review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v7aRWcM0AFE
Watch our Noctua interview about fan design and materials like LCP: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=82LZkglNiQ0

title: Noctua Has Competition: HAVN Performance Fans, BF360 Case, & Engineering Data
